turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there. I am wanting you to order a coffee drink for me from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, first off which Starbucks do you plan on picking it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like you to pick it up at 1782 N High St, Columbus Ohio. That is the closest one to me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what drink specifically did you have in mind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I really want the Iced Blonde Black and White Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that all, just the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you desire?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond. And make sure whipped cream is added as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will make sure that is added for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. Can you repeat the order to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes. You want a Grande Iced Blonde Black and White Mocha with almond milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: When do you plan to pick it up? Do you want me to order it right now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please do so, I want to pick it up now as I have some free time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will certainly do that for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome. Order in confirmed and will be ready for pickup in 10 minutes at 1782 N High St, Columbus, OH.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yay. Thanks again!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem!

items.name: Iced Blonde Black and White Mocha
